image.alt: Lanford & McInnis Orthodontics team smiling with patients in a bright, welcoming office

paragraphs.text: Proudly serving Anderson and the surrounding South Carolina communities, Lanford & McInnis Orthodontics puts patient care first in a fun, family-friendly environment. With Board Certified orthodontists Dr. McInnis and Dr. Lanford and a skilled team, the practice combines more than 25 years of experience, modern technology, and affordable, comfortable treatment to create beautiful, lasting smiles for patients of all ages.

items.title: 25+ Years Experience
items.text: Experienced, local orthodontists with more than 25 years creating confident, healthy smiles.

items.title: Board-Certified Doctors
items.text: Care led by Board Certified orthodontists Dr. McInnis and Dr. Lanford.

items.title: Family-Friendly Care
items.text: A welcoming, patient-first environment where every patient is treated like family.

items.title: Modern Technology
items.text: We use iTero digital scanning, self-ligating brackets, and digital X-rays for faster, more precise care.

paragraphs.text: Dr. McInnis is a Board Certified Orthodontist who has been creating life-changing smiles for over 25 years. He is passionate about the care he provides, known for his enthusiasm, caring approach, and sense of humor. Team members praise his attention to patients and his thoughtful leadership.

image.alt: Dr. David McInnis, Board Certified Orthodontist

paragraphs.text: Dr. Lanford is a Board Certified Orthodontist known for her compassion, professionalism, and thoughtful care. She brings a unique background and perspective to the practice and is committed to helping each patient feel confident and comfortable throughout treatment.

image.alt: Dr. Madison Lanford, Board Certified Orthodontist

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional braces, clear aligners, and modern bracket systems so patients of all ages can achieve healthy, confident smiles.

paragraphs.text: Lanford & McInnis Orthodontics has been proud to serve our South Carolina communities with an office location in Anderson. Thank you for giving us your continued trust and confidence, allowing us to provide you and your loved ones the best in orthodontic care.

Our doctors, Dr. McInnis and Dr. Lanford, have your care as their number one priority. That means you get the best orthodontic treatment with an affordable price and an enjoyable, family-friendly experience.
We prioritize patient-centered, family-friendly orthodontic care delivered with modern technology, affordable options, and a welcoming team environment.
Through advanced tools like digital scanning, efficient treatment options, and flexible scheduling, we work to make orthodontic care convenient and comfortable for every member of your family.

image.alt: Dr. David McInnis headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. David McInnis is a Board Certified Orthodontist who has been creating life-changing smiles for over 25 years. He is passionate about the care he provides and brings enthusiasm and a warm sense of humor to the practice.
He focuses on delivering high-quality orthodontic care in a friendly, family-oriented setting where patients feel comfortable and supported.

image.alt: Dr. David McInnis smiling in treatment room

paragraphs.text: Education and training details were not included in the uploaded files. Please contact our office or visit our full doctor profiles for complete education and certification information.

image.alt: Dr. David McInnis

paragraphs.text: When asked to describe him, one team member said, "He not only takes special care of his patients but is a giving and caring employer as well." That spirit of care guides the way Dr. McInnis treats every patient.

image.alt: Dr. David McInnis portrait
Dr. Madison Lanford headshot

paragraphs.text: When you first meet Dr. Lanford, you’ll quickly see why everyone loves her. She’s eloquent, humble, fiercely determined, and gracefully poised.
Dr. Lanford is a confident, capable, and compassionate Board Certified Orthodontist who brings a unique background and a high standard of professionalism to patient care.

image.alt: Dr. Madison Lanford in office

image.alt: Dr. Madison Lanford portrait

paragraphs.text: Dr. Lanford is known for her compassionate approach and dedication to patient comfort. She brings energy and professionalism to every treatment, and she is committed to building long-term relationships with patients and families.

image.alt: Dr. Madison Lanford smiling

paragraphs.text: Serving our amazing Anderson and surrounding communities is our privilege and priority. We are excited to meet you and help create the beautiful smile you deserve.

og_meta.title: About Us | Lanford & McInnis Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Lanford & McInnis Orthodontics in Anderson, SC — our mission, experienced doctors, and community-focused approach to orthodontic care.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Every smile starts with a new patient exam. Your initial visit gives you the chance to meet our friendly team, receive a complete oral exam with any needed X-rays, and learn which treatment options will best meet your goals.
We review your medical history, create a customized treatment plan, and discuss financial details, insurance options, and payment plans so your care fits your budget.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically for your convenience.
Flexible payment plans are available. Our treatment coordinator will help you find an option that fits your budget.
Before your appointment, please complete our new patient and health history forms so we can provide safe, personalized care. If you need help, call our office at (864) 226-2858.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online
Family enjoying time together outside

og_meta.description: Request a free consultation at Lanford & McInnis Orthodontics. Learn what to expect on your first visit, access new patient forms, and schedule your appointment

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Lakeshore Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Braces are the tried and true method to give you high-quality, consistent results. We offer a variety of options to fit your lifestyle: clear or traditional.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Having braces no longer means bulky and noticeable. Many of today’s braces are made from clear or tooth‑colored materials for a discreet look without sacrificing effectiveness.

image.alt: Smiling Woman with Clear Aligner

paragraphs.text: Durable and cost-effective, metal braces use small brackets and wires to gradually move teeth into place and deliver consistent results.

image.alt: Dental Checkup with Braces

paragraphs.text: Ceramic braces blend with your tooth color for a less noticeable option while still providing reliable tooth movement.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Self-ligating braces use a built-in clip instead of elastics, which can reduce friction and often means fewer adjustment visits.

image.alt: Modern dentist office interior with advanced technology

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners are a comfortable, discreet option that are removable for eating and brushing. They can address a wide range of orthodontic issues without brackets or wires.
Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and Spark aligners use advanced 3D planning to move teeth precisely while fitting into your lifestyle.

image.alt: Close-up of Invisalign aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: The iTero Element Scanner captures fast, radiation-free, high-resolution 3D scans so we can plan treatment precisely and avoid messy putty impressions.

image.alt: iTero digital scanner in use during orthodontic consultation

paragraphs.text: Digital radiography produces high-resolution images instantly and typically exposes patients to far less radiation than traditional film X-rays.

image.alt: Digital X-ray equipment showing detailed orthodontic imaging
Family enjoying time together outside

image.alt: Patient smiling with orthodontic braces in our clinic

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about orthodontic treatments, scheduling, payment options, and privacy at Lanford & McInnis Orthodontics.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional metal braces, clear braces, and removable clear aligners including Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and Spark aligners for discreet treatment. We also provide custom retainers to protect your results. Our team uses digital scans and modern appliances to tailor care for children, teens, and adults.

image.alt: Happy family portrait in orthodontic office

accordion.header: At what age should my child see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: We follow the American Association of Orthodontists’ guideline recommending an orthodontic evaluation by age 7. Early visits let us monitor growth, catch emerging issues, and plan treatment that may be simpler and faster when started at the right time.

image.alt: Parents and child smiling in office

accordion.header: How long does treatment usually take?

paragraphs.text: Treatment length depends on your specific needs. Many patients finish treatment between 12 and 24 months. During your initial consultation we’ll use digital scans and x-rays to estimate a personalized timeline and discuss options to help you reach your goals efficiently.

image.alt: Orthodontic team collaborating in office

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and offer flexible monthly payment options to fit family budgets. Our front desk will review your benefits and provide a clear estimate. We can also discuss third‑party financing if needed.

image.alt: Patient discussing payment options at desk

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment and what should I know about privacy?

paragraphs.text: Call or text us at (864) 226-2858 to schedule, or use the request form on our Home or Contact page. Our online form includes privacy and SMS consent language: by providing your phone number you agree to receive texts. For full details see our Privacy Policy at https://lanfordmcinnisorthodontics.com/privacy-policy/.

image.alt: Mother and daughter smiling together in clinic
Family enjoying time together outside
